tags.name: Service
tags.description: APIs to manage the service instances

put.description: Update registered service using id and ocl model.
Update registered service using id and ocl file url.

get.description: List registered service with query params.

post.description: Register new service using ocl model.
Register new service with URL of Ocl file.

get.description: List registered service group by serviceName, serviceVersion, cspName with category.

model.description: The business model of the managed service

period.description: The rental period of the managed service

currency.description: The billing currency of the managed service, valid values: euro,uso

Billing.description: The billing policy of the managed service

name.description: The Cloud Service Provider. valid values: aws, azure, alibaba, huawei

regions.description: The regions of the Cloud Service Provider

items.description: The regions of the Cloud Service Provider

CloudServiceProvider.description: The cloud service provider of the managed service

name.description: The name of the deploy variable

description.description: The description for the deploy variable

kind.description: The kind of the deploy variable

type.description: The type of the deploy variable

value.description: The value of the deploy variable

mandatory.description: Indicate the variable if is mandatory

DeployVariable.description: The variables for the deployment, which will be passed to the deployer

kind.description: The type of the Deployment, valid values: terraform...

context.description: The variables for the deployment, which will be passed to the deployer

deployer.description: The real deployer, something like terraform scripts...

Deployment.description: The deployment of the managed service

Flavor.description: The flavors of the managed service

name.description: The name of the managed service

serviceVersion.description: The version of the managed service

namespace.description: The namespace of the managed service

flavors.description: The flavors of the managed service

versions.description: List of the registered service group by service version.
